Home to a large Samoan population, the Carson High School football team has a larger defensive line than most NFL teams.

A poorer suburb, there are few sights or tourist destinations in Carson.
The Stubhub Center is home to LA's three top-level professional soccer teams:

value: content=One of the charter members of Major League Soccer, the Galaxy is best known for American star Landon Donovan and its former soccer superstar David Beckham.

content= Los Angeles' other MLS team, while not as famous or well known as the Galaxy, have recently had somewhat more success. The team name comes from Mexican club C.D. Guadalajara, popularly known as
(Spanish for "goats"); the owner of the Mexican club also owns the majority interest in Chivas USA. Unsurprisingly, the team has a strong Mexican fan base.

Ted's Burgers: Corner of Main and 220th

Yellow Basket: 22300 Avalon Blvd.

value: Quality Inn South Bay Carson Hotel 888 E Dominquer Street.  (310) 715-6688.  In the heart of the Southland, easily accessible from the I-405 San Diego Fwy, 710 Long Beach Fwy, 91 Artesia Fwy and 110 Harbor Fwy.
content=Bed and breakfast cabins. Guests can enjoy full breakfasts and private decks. Pet-friendly cabins also available.
